simplified: 虚心使人进步，骄傲使人落后

pronunciation.pinyin: xū xīn shǐ rén jìn bù , jiāo aò shǐ rén luò hòu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: xu1 xin1 shi3 ren2 jin4 bu4 , jiao1 ao4 shi3 ren2 luo4 hou4

details.simplified: 虚心使人进步，骄傲使人落后
details.traditional: 虛心使人進步，驕傲使人落後

meanings.value: modesty leads to progress, arrogance makes you fall behind (quote of Mao Zedong)
